results.content: 请避免乘坐公共交通工具
results.romanized: Qǐng bì miǎn chéng zuò gōng gòng jiāo tōng gōng jù

results.content: 你可以乘坐私人交通工具、德士或私召车

phrase.content: You can take your own private transport, a taxi or a private hire car.

results.romanized:
nǐ kě yǐ chéng zuò sī rén jiāo tōng gōng jù、
dé shì huò sī zhào chē

results.content: 如果咳嗽恶化，有呼吸困难，或发烧持续在38度以上

phrase.content: If your cough is getting worse and you feel breathless, or your fever is persistently above 38 degrees Celsius

results.romanized: rú guǒ ké sòu è huà ， yǒu hū xī kùn nán ， huò fā shāo chí xù zài 3 8 dù yǐ shàng

results.content: 请立刻戴上外科口罩，立即前往医院紧急部门。

phrase.content: Wear a surgical mask and come to our Emergency Department.

results.romanized: qǐng lì kè dài shàng wài kē kǒu zhào ， lì jí qián wǎng yì yuàn jǐn jí bù mén 。

results.content:
在紧急情况下，请拨995叫救护车。
请通知医护人员您近期验过冠状病毒。
若您之前有出国，请您通知医护人员。

phrase.content: In an emergency situation, call 995 for an ambulance. Inform the ambulance operator that you were recently tested for COVID-19 and also tell them your travel history.

results.romanized:
zài jǐn jí qíng kuàng xià ， qǐng bō 9 9 5 jiào jìu hù chē 。 
 qǐng tōng zhī yì hù rén yuán nín jìn qī yàn guò guān zhuàng bìng dú 。 
 ruò nín zhī qián yǒu chū guó ， qǐng nín tōng zhī yì hù rén yuán 。
